claim_data.description:
Por motivos médicos, no pude asistir a la competencia deportiva para la cual me había registrado.

Adjunto constancia médica emitida por el Hospital Universitario Ruiz y Páez, donde se certifica mi estado de salud posterior a un chequeo general.

Solicito amablemente el reembolso o un crédito para futuros eventos.

metadata.text_content:
Hospital Universitario Ruiz y Páez
Fecha:
Medicina Interna
Ciudad Bolívar - Edo. Bolívar
CONSTANCIA MÉDICA
A quien pueda interesar
Por medio de la presente hago constar que el ciudadano Luis Angel Duque
de 17 años de edad, portador de la cedula de identidad v- 25.781.084;
después de haberle realizado el examen médico general; se encuentra en
buenas condiciones clínicas, apto para actividad física de cualquier tipo.
Constancia que se expide a petición de la persona interesada
Datos del Médico Tratante:

authenticity_indicators.quality_assessment: The document appears to be of standard quality, with clear and readable text. The layout is simple and formal.

de 17 años de edad, portador de la cedula de identidad v- 25.781.084;
después de haberle realizado el examen médico general; se encuentra en
buenas condiciones clínicas, apto para actividad física de cualquier tipo.

Datos del Médico Tratante:

llm_decision.explanation: The medical certificate provided states that Luis Angel Duque is in good clinical condition and fit for physical activity of any type. This contradicts the claim that he was unable to attend the sporting event due to medical reasons. Additionally, the medical certificate lacks a signature and official stamp, further reducing its validity. The event date was March 3, 2024, and the current date is March 22, 2024, so the event has already occurred.
reasoning_steps: Analyzed the claim description and supporting documents.
Verified that the provided medical certificate is an image file.
Confirmed that the name on the medical certificate matches the claimant's name.
Identified that the medical certificate states the claimant is in good health and fit for physical activity.
Determined that the medical certificate lacks a signature and official stamp.
Concluded that the medical certificate contradicts the claim reason.
Checked the event date and current date to confirm that the event has already passed.
Made the decision to deny the claim based on the contradictory medical information and lack of supporting evidence for a medical emergency preventing participation.

expected_answer.explanation: documentation states the claimant is in good condition, lacks a signature
